title: Roots and Fruits
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, British, English
description: Small veggie food cafe in the city centre. Offers vegetarian meals and some vegan ones, Cakes made by That Old Chestnut, a range of hot and cold drinks. Meals range from veggie breakfasts to soups, Mexican, lunch staples such as jacket potatoes and burgers.
